channel.title: Scar Color Syntax - Just try it. You might like it
channel.description:
This isn't any new code or anything, just my preference of scar color syntax. I always thought that the syntax coloring is kind of annoying and this way you can spot things a lot easier!
[img]http://img137.imageshack.us/img137/7520/scarsytaxcolorbmpfx5.png[/img]
All you have to do is try it out. You can always set it back to default if you like. :)
Go into Scar and click on Tools > Options. Once you're there, click on Syntax colors.
Don't worry about Characters, it's fine the way it is. Click on Comments and select the foreground color Green and check Bold. Click on Strings and select the foreground color Red. Click on Keywords and check Bold. Don't worry about Identifiers, it's fine the way it is. Don't worry about Keywords, it's fine the way it is. Don't worry about Space, it's fine the way it is. Click on Numbers and select the foreground color Light Blue and check Bold. Click on Floating Numbers and select the foreground color Light Blue and check Bold. Click on Hex and select the foreground color Gold and check Bold.
Now look for a script on this forum or in your scar scripts folder and open it. [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,8416.0.html]Try this script if you can't find one.[/url]
Notice everything is much more vibrant and easier to see. I really liked it when I set that up, maybe you will too. If you don't like it then stick with the original. Remember this is just for fun. :)
Please post comments and/or suggestions to make it look better and easier to find things and learn and whatever else.
~Ron :D

@Ron wrote:

This isn’t any new code or anything, just my preference of scar color syntax. I always thought that the syntax coloring is kind of annoying and this way you can spot things a lot easier!

All you have to do is try it out. You can always set it back to default if you like.

Go into Scar and click on Tools > Options. Once you’re there, click on Syntax colors.

Don’t worry about Characters, it’s fine the way it is.
Click on Comments and select the foreground color Green and check Bold.
Click on Strings and select the foreground color Red.
Click on Keywords and check Bold.
Don’t worry about Identifiers, it’s fine the way it is.
Don’t worry about Keywords, it’s fine the way it is.
Don’t worry about Space, it’s fine the way it is.
Click on Numbers and select the foreground color Light Blue and check Bold.
Click on Floating Numbers and select the foreground color Light Blue and check Bold.
Click on Hex and select the foreground color Gold and check Bold.

Now look for a script on this forum or in your scar scripts folder and open it. Try this script if you can’t find one.

Notice everything is much more vibrant and easier to see. I really liked it when I set that up, maybe you will too. If you don’t like it then stick with the original. Remember this is just for fun.

Please post comments and/or suggestions to make it look better and easier to find things and learn and whatever else.
